title: Sejuani VS  Skarner
body: Who's the better buy, and why? Thanks!

replies.body: sej is . skarner is weak as fck. conmstircted by the fact he has to fight on the spires...... and doesnt ahve a dash like sej
Sejuani is infinitely better than Skarner because she has both a gap closer and ranged hard CC while Skarner has neither.

> [{quoted}](name=Tazret,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tbfGzfF6,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-19T12:46:33.345+0000)
>
> Who&#039;s the better buy, and why? Thanks!

Two completely different champs, but skarners in a better position atm. Sejuani's strong but completely team reliant and is can be counterjungled. She also has a bad early game. Skarner is a lot stronger than people think

It really depends.  

Skarner is a juggernaut (so super hard to kill.  Great damage when you get in, but really no gap closer and can be kited).  He has his 'i choose you!' ultimate.

Personally, I prefer Sejuani.  She has good ganks pre-6 unlike Skarner, and her teamfight potential is top notch especially late game.  She won't put out the damage a Skarner will though.
